duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead projects and manage other engineers and designers to maintain scope, schedule, and budget.
Develop technical proposal scope of works and design estimates based on client proposal requests.
Develop project schedules based on project scope deliverables.
Interact with operating personnel at client sites to conduct analysis and solve client problems.
Communicate with clients and project managers on technical solutions and reporting project status.
Develop process flow diagrams and piping and instrumentation diagrams.
Size and specify typical process equipment and perform calculations for process systems.
Check process project deliverables and contribute to the preparation of construction documents.
Interface with vendors, review construction submittals, and answer RFIs.
Mentor other process engineers and designers, plan and delegate project-specific tasks.
Assist with weekly resource planning activities for process engineers and designers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering from an ABET-accredited school.
Registered professional engineer or eligible to obtain Virginia and Maryland licenses.
